app_descript:
App Name: Ice Cream Cake Maker

Brief:

Step into a sugary world of frozen delights with Ice Cream Cake Maker! This pastry kitchen simulation invites both kids and adults into the enchanting realm of dessert creation. Put on your apron and embark on an exciting baking adventure, showcasing your prowess as an expert icy dessert maker. This interactive game not only stirs your culinary creativity but allows you to indulge in the fun of mixing, baking, and decorating‚Äîa complete package for enthusiasts seeking a sweet virtual experience.
